sentences.sentence: Even with rigorous training, a person from sea level will almost always lag behind the Sherpas at altitude, Kamler says.
sentences.translation: 即便经过严格训练，在高地行进时，来自海平面的人也几乎总是落后于这些牧人。

sentences.sentence: The "sherpas" return to Bonn today to continue the backroom negotiations on a global deal to tackle climate change.
sentences.translation: 今天，“最高会议筹备人员”返回波恩，为达成应对气候变化全球协议继续进行幕后谈判。
